sentences.en: Animal and man come unto me, the anchorite.
sentences.cn: 动物和人都来找我这个隐士。

sentences.en: Guard against injuring anchorite! If ye have done so, however, well then, kill him also!
sentences.cn: 注意别伤害隐士! 假如你已经这么作了, 那么还是干脆把他给宰了的好!

sentences.en: He lived in Paris more lonely than an anchorite in the deserts of Thebes.
sentences.cn: 他住在巴黎，比住在底比斯沙漠里的隐士生活还要孤独。

sentences.en: This uncommon word, never before spoken in Star Wars, an anchorite is someone who has withdrawn from society to become somewhat of a religious hermit.
sentences.cn: 这个不常见的词之前从未在《星战》中出现，“隐士”是指那种退出社会，在某种程度上变成宗教的隐居修道士的人。

trans.tran_en: a person who lives in seclusion, esp a religious recluse; hermit
